mapper.select: SELECT TB.BNO , TB.TITLE , TB.CONTENT , CASE WHEN TM.LEFT = '1' THEN RPAD(SUBSTR(TB.USER_ID,1,1),LENGTH(TB.USER_ID),'*') ELSE TB.USER_ID END AS USER_ID , TB.REGDATE , TB.UPDATEDATE , TB.SECRET , CASE WHEN TM.LEFT = '1' THEN '(탈퇴한 회원)' ELSE TM.NAME END AS NAME FROM TBL_BOARD TB JOIN TBL_MEMBER TM ON TB.USER_ID = TM.ID WHERE TB.BNO = #{bno}
